title: 喵式记分板无法使用papi变量
author: 自行车啊线

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
输入下列命令 安装PAPI的扩展组件
papi ecloud download player
papi ecloud download vault
papi ecloud download server
papi ecloud download javascript
papi reload

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content: 你没有下载对应的papi变量包吗

replies.author: AAAA哥
replies.txt_content:
如果想使用该变量,请输入该命令下载对应的组件
papi ecloud download playerpoints复制代码
